name: currency-codes-ru-en-names
description: Small library for getting currency names by currency code(s). Names available on Russian and English. 184 currency codes in total. Data from https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9A%D0%BE%D0%B4%D1%8B_%D0%B8_%D0%BA%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%84%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D1%8B_%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8E%D1%82
author: Alexander Sharabarov <alcovegan@gmail.com>
